name: Brick Solve
description:
DESCRIPTION

Brick Solve is a 3D puzzle solving game made in Unreal Engine. You play as a robot that’s been disposed of, and you now find yourself at the bottom of a tech company's old facility. With the help of a ray gun prototype you found, find your way out by materializing and dematerializing objects between many options.

FEATURES
  • Realistic artstyle
  • Modify/upgrade yourself
  • Mind Breaking puzzles
  • Lasers!
  • Sci-fi ambience
  • And more robots with lasers!
  • Easy for beginners, tough to master 
  • Story
